title: École International de Théâtre Jacques Lecoq
École International de Théâtre Jacques Lecoq
École International de Théâtre Jacques Lecoq
Royal Central School of Speech and Drama
The Academy of Performing Arts, VŠMU
Puppet Theatre Barge
notes: Marionette skills through performance along with box office experience.

title: WindFire Designs
notes: Study of complete textile product fabrication processes—from 3D shape capture, to 2D template drafting, to finished sewn items. Design and construction of custom stage props—work with leather, silk, linen, dyes, stainless wire and composites.

title: Puppetry and Opera
notes: With Darren East and Stuart Barker exploring puppetry in opera.

title: Familie Flöz
notes: Specialized classes in mask performance with Valentina Bordenave, Anna Kistel, Michael Vogel and Andres Angulo. Featuring movement based on Alexander Technique, fundamental mask performance skills, devising and character development.

title: Flöz Akademie
notes: Specialized academy in mask performance and making with Valentina Bordenave, Anna Kistel, Michael Vogel and Hajo Schüler. Featuring movement based on Alexander Technique and full mask making process.

title: Parade de la Lune et du soleil — a lantern parade
Project CLEA — performance with primary schools
notes: A 5-week project with pupils from local primary schools concluding with a concert sung by the pupils themselves. With Cie La Septima

title: Tonnerre s’éclaire 2022
notes: A involved lantern parade for the people of the town of Tonnerre with lanterns based on the architecture of the town. Including acrobatics, juggling, dancing and object manipulation performed to baroque and traditional French music. With theatre company La Septima

title: The Secret Life of Shoes, research for a Shoe Opera
notes: A research into the secret life of shoes through their dynamics of movement, colours, forms and sound.

title: Chasses de lumières
notes: A chasing of light. As the earth rotates on its way around the sun, we race afterwards drawing its path of time. Co-directed by Emmanuelle Bouyer and Yasuyo Mochizuki

title: Tonnerre s’éclaire 2021
notes: A involved lantern parade for the people of the town of Tonnerre with lanterns based on the architecture of the town. Including acrobatics, juggling, dancing and object manipulation performed to baroque and traditional French music.  With theatre company La Septima

title: The Nose
notes: Directed by Rene Baker, Devised form Gogol’s short story The Nose.

title: Low Batt.
notes: Directed by Janina Lange Live Foley performance to accompany an exhibition, working with Foley artist Ruth Sullivan.

title: The River Girl
notes: By Wendy Cope. Directed by Rob Humphreys
